name: Euphonia Talking Machine 1845
description:
The Euponia was a talking machine created in the early to mid-nineteenth century by the Austrian inventor Joseph Faber and exhibited in 1845 in Philadelphia and in 1846 in London's Egyptian Hall.
==
Faber's "Fabulous Talking Machine" was constructed of several different mechanisms and instruments: a piano and a mechanical replica of the human throat and vocal organs.
==
I just recreated that machine in 3D.
Made by Blender and Photoshop.

-Biwi
